module.name: edge_shape_feature
module.keywords: module, edge shape, bevel edge, step edge, radius edge, parameter, electrical, electronic, layered electronic product,

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe certain explicitly modeled parametrically defined geometric feature definitions.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Layered 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1693;
items within the scope of application module Value with unit extension, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1753.

aa.refpath: shape_representation <= representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'bevel width'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation => coordinated_representation_item

shape_representation <= representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'bevel angle'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation => coordinated_representation_item

shape_representation <= representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'radius length'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation => coordinated_representation_item

shape_representation <= representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'step depth'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation => coordinated_representation_item

shape_representation <= representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'step width'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation => coordinated_representation_item
